ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep. I got two of them last night.. one dropped from a clockwork MA, the other from the goblin king! A nice dwarf who was farming the zone gave me both. They
ygData.messageBody:
Yep. I got two of them last night.. one dropped from a clockwork MA, the
other from the goblin king! A nice dwarf who was farming the zone gave me
both. They look like red aprentice robes, AC2, Gnome only, but the class is
set to NONE so nobody can wear it.

I combined them with 1 firewater and 1 metal rod, and presto: Thermal Cloak!
AC6, +20 save cold. Gnome only. My skill is at 78, if I remember correctly,
and it was not trivial. But I succeeded on both tries.

Would be a neat item to sell if not for the gnome only part :)

Yilmatin Kylari
51st Rogue of Bristlebane
Talon Guard
Bertoxxulous


>From: "Drake, Robert, CTR, AFPCA/OPAA" <robert.drake@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
>To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak
>Date: Fri, 21 Jul 2000 08:07:56 -0400
>
>Yes, they can't have us gnomes killing other gnomes for a tinker item;
>that'd be gnomicide and hurt our faction. I did some exploring of the
>mining town in Sola, but didn't see it. My bet it's on a mob. And like
>Bronze items in High Keep, it may be possible to see it worn on a
>gob...maybe, I mean.
>
>Kilkin
>
